channel.title: Tech

item.title: HP ZBook 8 Gli 14-Inch Review: An Unimpressive Workstation

item.title: ‘We Ain’t Seen Nothing Yet’—Trump’s Mass Deportations Will Only Grow From Here
item.description: Militias and far-right extremists believed they would be central to Trump’s mass deportation plans. Instead he militarized law enforcement agencies.

item.title: Purple Promo Codes and Deals: Up to 30% Off
